About

Nikita Klim is an internationally acclaimed photographer, filmmaker, YouTube creator and entrepreneur based in Gomel, Belarus. Nikita uses his platforms to inspire and help people pursue their passions behind.

Personal achievement for this Belarusian was having his work featured on two special collection coins issued by the Royal Belarusian Mint.
